channel.title: Unholy Blitz - The New Pk Revolution
channel.description:
Uhmmm, Hi guys. This is my new server based off Iclarity 1.05 and i think it's a wonderful source. I can start by giving credits: 80% to Primadude. 20% to me.
I've added many NPC'S & added some commands and much more etc can't explain now but Enjoy. The server is very stable, few glitches, duel arena, mb, barrows, tzhaar, jungle teleport, karamja, fully working amulet of glory rubbing, working teletablets and more. There is many training zones including: varrock guards, falador guards, varrock dark wizards, karamja monkeys, jungle lobsters & monkeys, lumby cows, farmers, man's, goblins, chickens etc
i would also tell you that it got working ancients and modern magic on players, npcs. All important specs working including, dds, dscimmy, gmaul, mage long, mage short and much more, too tired to tell you all about, the server is in beta stage and you can download and try, more information at the end of the page. Lets move on!.....
As i said its stable, and it contains not too much crappy files that turns the server slow, its fast. I haven't made any big differences since i downloaded Iclarity v1.05 but as i told you, theres some changes to make the server better and i have added 50+ or more npcs and around 4 new commands! And i will work much harder, im NEW to coding and i havent coded much at all+ im about to turn 14 soon so i hope you understand why this isn't Perfect im also swedish and i dont understand so FREAKING much of this forum; thanks Primadude for making such a wonderful server!
http://sv.tinypic.com/view.php?pic=23mvc51&s=3
http://sv.tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2vcb7sh&s=3
http://sv.tinypic.com/view.php?pic=28mkdvt&s=3
Everything I've made on this Source since i got it took about 3 hours to make, So YOU SEE ITS A GOOD START......... _______________________________
~ Masterkorv12
